name: Analyze Barcode Sequencing Data
description: Analyze sequencing data to extract, quantify and determine lineage relationships of barcodes
author: Biomni Synthetic Biology Tools

inputs.name: input_file
inputs.description: Path to the input sequencing file in FASTQ or FASTA format

inputs.name: barcode_pattern
inputs.description: Regular expression pattern to identify barcodes. If None, will use flanking sequences

inputs.name: flanking_seq_5prime
inputs.description: 5' flanking sequence of the barcode region

inputs.name: flanking_seq_3prime
inputs.description: 3' flanking sequence of the barcode region

inputs.name: min_count
inputs.description: Minimum count threshold for considering a barcode

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results
